description: Brisca is a traditional card game very popular in Spain and Italy. It is played with a Spanish deck and is ideal for 2 to 4 players.
rules: A Spanish deck of 40 cards is used (without eights or nines).
The goal is to score the highest number of points with the cards won.

A hand of 3 cards is dealt to each player, and one card is placed face up on the table to define the trump suit.
Players play one card per turn, following the suit or using the trump suit if they don't have cards of the initial suit.
The winner of the trick collects the cards and starts the next one.
cardValues: The rest of the cards have no value.
winDescription: The player or team with the most points at the end of the game is the winner.
